title: 10th anniversary rewards
body:
Hi, 
People are saying you need to play games in order to get the 10th anniversary rewards, and I can play for the first couple of days of the event but am going away next week and will be unable to play, can I still get the rewards even if I don’t play games? Or can I just get a friend to login to my account without having to play a game and still be able to redeem my awards?

replies.body: So I played a couple of games today and still don't have access to the rewards. Has it been activated yet or do we have to wait?

The first mission will become available at 1pm PDT on the 17th, which is 7am tomorrow (18th) morning for AEDT (if I'm not mistaken). The times in the client haven't been localised, for some reason.

You can refer to the support page for more info: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036377774-Let-s-Celebrate-10-Years-of-League-

They have said that the rewards will stick around for a bit so you don't have to redeem them every day, but no details on how long they will remain after the 10 days are up. I'll see if I can get some clarification for you.
If a friend plays on your account, enjoy your permaban, acc sharing is instantly bannable

So does that mean on any single account you can only login on 1 computer? I can look it up on the rules page if you can't be bothered explaining. Just thought if you don't mind clarifying so I don't make that mistake when I go away.

It means that only the person who created the account should be accessing it (you can still play freely on multiple computers). So, for example, you couldn't just give someone else, such as a friend or family member, your login details and let them play on the account, as that can very realistically result in a permanent ban. It's also important to note that account sharing can also make it much more difficult to resolve a compromised account.
Ok yeah that makes sense. How would Riot know if someone else is using you're account though?

Riot would use a wide variety of factors to identify if it's a different user. For example, there are certain things that tend to stand out in match history, such as significant changes with summoner spells, champs, statistics etc. and there's also a variety of "behind the scenes" data that Riot has access to that we, as players, don't.
Ok no worries. Thanks for the clarification Heart.
Didn’t know that thx for the warning
On the riot support website it says it will last till November 19th if anyone else was concerned about this
Do you have a link? That would be very helpful.

Thanks heaps! Looks like that's the best source for that info at the moment.

Unclear if you'll have to play 10 games if you don't start completing them until day 10+, but I would say it's likely that they will unlock one at a time and that will be the case.
